mapper.sql: id, batch_no, project_name, build_env, build_type, case_num, case_pass_num, case_fail_num, case_pass_rate, newly_fail_num, keep_failing_num, project_start_time, project_end_time, project_duration
mapper.select: select id, case_pass_rate as casePassRate, case_pass_num as casePassNum, case_fail_num as caseFailNum from tb_dashboard order by batch_no desc limit 0,7
select id, case_pass_num as casePassNum from tb_dashboard order by batch_no desc limit 0,7
select id, case_fail_num as caseFailNum from tb_dashboard order by batch_no desc limit 0,7
select id, newly_fail_num as newlyFailNum from tb_dashboard order by batch_no desc limit 0,7
select id, keep_failing_num as keepFailingNum from tb_dashboard order by batch_no desc limit 0,7

select
from tb_dashboard order by id desc limit 0,1
select batch_no from tb_dashboard where batch_no like (date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d%')) order by batch_no desc limit 0,1

select case_name as caseName, group_concat( case_result order by batch_no desc ) as historyResults from tb_testcase where case_name in ( select case_name from tb_testcase where batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and case_result = 0 ) group by case_name
mapper.insert: insert into tb_dashboard (id, batch_no, project_name, build_env, build_type, case_num, case_pass_num, case_fail_num, case_pass_rate, newly_fail_num, keep_failing_num, project_start_time, project_end_time, project_duration) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildEnv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{caseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{casePassNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{caseFailNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{casePassRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{newlyFailNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keepFailingNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectStartTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{projectEndTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{projectDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update tb_dashboard
batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
build_env = #{buildEnv,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
build_type = #{buildType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
case_num = #{caseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
case_pass_num = #{casePassNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

project_start_time = #{projectStartTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
project_end_time = #{projectEndTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
project_duration = #{projectDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_dashboard set batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, build_env = #{buildEnv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, build_type = #{buildType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, case_num = #{caseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, case_pass_num = #{casePassNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, case_fail_num = #{caseFailNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, case_pass_rate = #{casePassRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, newly_fail_num = #{newlyFailNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, keep_failing_num = #{keepFailingNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_start_time = #{projectStartTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, project_end_time = #{projectEndTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, project_duration = #{projectDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
